company.name: Murex
company.designation: A global fintech / capital markets software company

sponsors.bio: A global fintech / capital markets software company. Their platform MX.3 supports trading, risk, treasury and post-trade operations used by banks and financial institutions around the world.

sponsors.bio: A software engineering consulting firm that helps global tech startups scale by providing remote engineers (frontend, backend, mobile, DevOps, QA) from Lebanon.
sponsors.description: A software engineering consulting firm that helps global tech startups scale by providing remote engineers (frontend, backend, mobile, DevOps, QA) from Lebanon.

sponsors.name: KDD
sponsors.bio: KDD was founded in 1962 as a dairy company with a vision to achieve nutritional goals through packaged dairy food for the local market. Operating from its first plant in the Shuwaikh area in Kuwait, KDD began producing milk and yoghurt. Over the years, KDD grew and diversified its portfolio. Today, it has a multi-product, multi-category portfolio that caters to a wide variety of consumers in the region.
sponsors.description: KDD was founded in 1962 as a dairy company with a vision to achieve nutritional goals through packaged dairy food for the local market. Operating from its first plant in the Shuwaikh area in Kuwait, KDD began producing milk and yoghurt. Over the years, KDD grew and diversified its portfolio. Today, it has a multi-product, multi-category portfolio that caters to a wide variety of consumers in the region.
